acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should be able to create instances of generic POJOs with factory methods when the concrete type is known
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldCreateInstancesOfGenericPojosWithFactoryMethodsWhenTheConcreteTypeIsKnown

test-step.description: When I invoke Podam for a Generic Pojo specifying the concrete types
Then the Object should not be null
Then the Object should not be null
Then the two objects class java.util.Date and class java.util.Date should be equal
